704627f-b.text:
Glenmore Avenue, at the S. E. corner of Pennsylvanis Avenue, aa)owine a Russian Greek 0rthodox Church. Views 2 and 3 show the rear of the church, looking north across subwav construction, from Pitkin Avenue. Past the church is Public School No. 173.
September 13, 1940
Views 1,2,S
P. L. Sperr
